Good Morning Britain 's Susanna Reid got into a fiery clash with former Conservative MP Edwina Currie on Wednesday's show in a debate over the government's handling of the pandemic.

articles.title: Cardi B hits back at Candace Owens for her rant about raunchy Grammy performance - Daily Mail
articles.description: Cardi B hit back at Candace Owens for her rant about rapper's raunchy Grammy performance with Megan Thee Stallion, in a growing war of words on Twitter.
articles.content: Right-wing commentator Candace Owens and Cardi B are threatening to sue each other in a bitter Twitter clash after the conservative pundit hit out at the singer's 'degenerate' WAP performance at the … [+10236 chars]
